* Objectives of the Dashboard *

Purpose of the tool is to provide insights on Organizational performance of certain key metrics on demand.
This dashboard also helps in comparing organizational performance to BU/SBU performance.

Metrics analyzed are:

1) Average Effort per Ticket (AET) [AET @ Technology & Sub technology]

2) Average Effort per Ticket Loaded (AETL)

3) AET Loaded Component Effort distribution

4) Priority wise Backlog Index

5) Overall Effort Distribution
